Title: Russian losses in the east: more than 1,000 invaders per day, armored vehicles and guns
Description: This was reported by the official telegram channel of OSU -Khortytsia-. Defense forces also destroyed 29 armored fighting vehicles, 12 guns and mortars, 56 units of motor vehicles and 10 units of special equipment. In addition, six EW devices, eight ammunition depots and 106 shelters were hit in the East during the day. The defense forces continue to actively inflict losses in manpower and equipment on the enemy's troops, exhausting the enemy along the entire line of combat engagement.

Title: Suicide on the battlefield: Russians shoot through -akhmat-
Description: How is this related to the frequent suicides of Russian soldiers on the battlefield in the -Suspilne Novosti- marathon broadcast explained the commander of the battalion of shock air defense systems -Achilles- of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after the basket captain Ivan Sirk, captain Yury Fedorenko. The military said that the professionally trained -Akhmatians- do not fight on the front line. Instead, the appearance of -akhmat- units in a certain direction indicates a low level of motivation and discipline among regular Russian occupation troops. - Where -Ahmat- appears - there are problems in the troops, which they have to solve at the expense of a system of coercion, humiliation and destruction of servicemen of the Russian occupation forces, actually carrying out punishment directly on the battlefield, he said. As a result of such a system, it is easier for Russian soldiers to shoot themselves than to retreat without completing the task, because in the near rear they will be abused, tortured or even executed by the -Akhmatians-. — That is why you can often see a video published on social networks, when the occupier, having received an insignificant injury, for example, to the lower limbs, commits suicide by shooting himself in the head. It is easier for him to die on the battlefield than to return without completing the task to the rear. This result is ensured by the -Ahmat- unit, Yuriy Fedorenko explained. He noted that the Russian soldiers had only two options left - either to die on the battlefield or to be executed by the -Akhmatians-. - How long will the Russians tolerate that this very unit can do whatever they want with them, like with dolls - it's their choice, to die in Ukraine or at the hands of the -Akhmatians-, - concluded the drone commander. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in Kharkiv region, the Russians attack with -barracks- according to the Donetsk scenario, but the Defense Forces destroy 90% of the enemy's armored vehicles and 60-70% of the infantry.

Title: In Sumy Oblast, a person died as a result of a Russian attack on an energy facility
Description: This was reported by the Ministry of Energy in the morning of September 14. The enemy hit an energy facility on the territory, equipment and shelter were damaged, several substations were de-energized. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy shelled Sumshchyna 6 times.

Title: Poland will provide 100 million euros for the purchase of shells for Ukraine
Description: This stated Polish Foreign Minister Radosław Sikorski during a visit to Kyiv. The minister said that Poland will provide the first 50 million euros already this year, and the rest next year. -We highly appreciate this initiative and payments will be made,- he added. Radoslav Sikorskyi explained that Poland delayed the payment to the fund for the purchase of ammunition because the official responsible for the coordination of this process - the former head of the government agency for strategic reserves, Michal Kuchmerovskyi - was accused of committing corruption crimes. -Previously, we have already handed over about 400 tanks, howitzers and air defense elements to Ukraine. We are also considering the provision of new batches of aid, in particular, MiG-29 aircraft,- said the head of the Polish Foreign Ministry. As reported by ArmyInform, in Poland officially the NATO-Ukraine Center (JATEC) has started work. The joint center with NATO will help Ukraine not only to implement procedures, approaches and standards, but also to share its own experience.

Title: Before the offensive? The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces posted his photos with our attack a...
Description: Photos from the meeting were published on September 14 in the social networks of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces. -On the eve of the battle,- Oleksandr Syrskyi commented on the photo. It is possible that the photo is related to the report of a new breakthrough by Ukrainian assault groups on the Russian border. As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces showed another breakthrough of the enemy's border defense.

Title: Leaky Russia — Defense forces have shown another breakthrough in the enemy's border defenses
Description: The video of the breakthrough appeared on the channel of the Khorne group unit 116 of the mechanized brigade. -The two most modest assault battalions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, accompanied by the immodest us, the Khorne group, are carrying out a double penetration of the Rashka and the Russian army. A leaky state with leaky borders. The top of military art and maneuver warfare,- the unit commented on the video. Earlier, Khorne group reported: -in a new place, kilometers away, in a Russian town …... a group of Russian soldiers numbering more than a thousand people, under threat of encirclement.- We wish our boys success. As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces destroyed another Russian bridge across the Sejm.

Title: The Ministry of Defense allowed mobile workshops for the repair of weapons to be put into operation
Description: About this is in the message of the department on Saturday, September 14. -Repair workshops are made in variants for repairing oversized samples of OVT — on the basis of an off-road pickup truck, and on the chassis of a truck - for the performance of large-scale repair work on large, complex units and heavy units of large-scale military equipment and weapons,- the Ministry of Defense informs. It is noted that mobile repair shops equipped with the necessary equipment to carry out: In field conditions on the basis of repair shops, repair specialists can diagnose and eliminate malfunctions of electrical equipment, disassembly and assembly work. In addition, Ukrainian-made mobile repair shops are equipped to perform a wide range of locksmith and metalworking works. There is the necessary equipment for tire fitting, soldering, refueling of high-pressure cylinders, charging and maintenance of batteries etc. All cycles of work are organized in comfortable conditions for personnel and with the modern tools and equipment necessary for this, the MOU added. -Ukrainian-made mobile repair shops of OVT allow you to perform most of the work in the field, without spending time and resources on sending equipment for repair to the rear and returning it from stationary repair and maintenance points. With the help of mobile workshops, weapons will be repaired and serviced many times faster,- the MOU emphasized. The Ministry of Defense also reminded that manufacturers and developers of OVT samples with additional questions regarding the product codification process can contact the Main Directorate for Life Cycle Support of Weapons and Military Equipment by e-mail: mdalc@mil.ua As ArmiyaInform wrote, at the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine codified and approved for delivery the field modular kitchen MK-500, designed for cooking in the field for military personnel numbering up to 500 people.

Title: The air-sea battle — -shahed- lost to our boat
Description: Video of combat work released on September 14 Military- Naval Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. After a targeted attack, the Shahed exploded in the air, its fragments fell into the sea. As reported by ArmyInform, 72 of 76 shot down, and 2 flew to Russia - results of the night reflection of the Shahed attack.

Title: The enemy destroyed the only humanitarian aid distribution center in Antonivka, Kherson Region
Description: About this reported the head of the Kherson MBA Roman Mrochko on the evening of August 13. -Today the enemy destroyed the only point of invincibility and one of the humanitarian aid distribution centers that operated on the basis of the FAP hospital named after O.S. Luchansky, which is located in the part of Antonivka behind the bridge of the same name,- said Roman Mrochko. As a result of enemy shelling, a fire broke out in the premises. The fire destroyed the building. As ArmyInform wrote, last day, September 13, as a result of Russian shelling in the Kherson region, 1 person died , another 10 were injured.

Title: -Happy tank troops day!-: Ukrainian hacktivists posted greetings on Russian websites
Description: ArmiyaInform learned that an image with such an inscription appeared instead of the start pages on the websites of -RosNefteGazInstrument-, -Smartlift-, -CIAS - Digital Information and Analytical System-, -Voronezh Metal- and 7 other Russian enterprises. As reported Earlier, 33 Russian sites were attacked by hackers in honor of the 33rd anniversary of Ukraine's Independence.

Title: The buggy, the mountains and the house burned down - a spectacular destruction of enemy transport
Description: The video of combat work appeared on September 14 on the unit's channel. -For a morning mood, watch how Russian equipment burns. This time, the Orc buggy hid perfectly in the bushes. The scout operator had to work hard to find this target. Then a good blow with the fpvishka and the buggy burns epically. We have never done such a gas tank flash. The house in which the same occupiers lived burned down in one fell swoop, and two targets were destroyed at once with one drone,- wrote -Sharp Kartuza-. As reported by ArmyInform, the buhankocide on the Kharkiv border continues: five more -slices- -Sharp kartuzy- were cut.

Title: The Steel Fist of the Armed Forces of Ukraine — Oleksandr Syrskyy congratulated Tank Troops Day
Description: Greetings posted on the official social media pages of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine on September 14. He recalled that the large-scale Russian aggression was a test of the strength and power of the Ukrainian army, which our tankers passed with dignity. -Our tank soldiers have advanced experience of conducting combat operations in the conditions of a new type of war, and almost the whole world wants to adopt this experience. After all, a new tactic of using armored vehicles is currently being used, taking into account the effective countermeasures against enemy fpv-drones and other unmanned vehicles,- the message says. Aleksandr Syrskyi thanked the thousands of Ukrainian tankmen, -who at this moment are repelling the Moscow aggressor on the front lines.- -My special words of thanks to the Ukrainian tank builders, mechanical engineers and craftsmen who are working on the repair and restoration of Ukrainian and trophy armored vehicles, which will continue to destroy the Russian invaders. Eternal memory and eternal glory to the tank heroes who, at the cost of their own lives, defended Ukrainian statehood and protected the people!-, Sirsky emphasized. And he added: -Tank troops are the steel fist of the Armed Forces of Ukraine! And the Russian equipment destroyed in the battles is a vivid confirmation of that. Glory to the Ukrainian tank troops!-. As ArmyInform wrote, the head of the Ukrainian Ministry of Defense Rustem Umerov congratulated our tankers on their professional holiday.

Title: Russia trembles - drones struck the enemy on its own territory
Description: Video appeared on the unit's channel. -Our group continues to actively destroy Russians on their territories both day and night. This is their payback for freeing us from spending time with our families,- commented the cadres in -wings to hell.- As reported by ArmyInform, the drones of the Quick Death unit of the Kharkiv border detachment destroyed the landing in the Belgorod region, where the positions of the Russians were located.

Title: -Iskander- was struck by the occupiers in the Kharkiv region: 5 people were injured in the region
Description: informed Oleg Synenubov, chief of Kharkiv Oblast, in detail about the consequences of enemy shelling in the Kharkiv region during the past day. In Kupyansk, a 64-year-old civilian man was injured as a result of enemy shelling from the Iskander OTRK, and the buildings of a bread factory were destroyed. Later, a 30-year-old woman was injured by a Russian FPV drone. Also, in the city, as a result of shelling from rocket launchers, private houses were destroyed. Also, in the Kup'chnsky district, a 47-year-old civilian man in the village of Dvorichna of the Dvorichnan community and a 65-year-old man in the village of Novoosynov of the Kuriliv community were injured as a result of enemy shelling. Another person - a 67-year-old man - was injured by shelling from the Russian military in the village of Borova of the Boriv community of the Kupyan district. The shelling caused a large-scale fire in the ecosystem there: coniferous litter burned on an area of ​​6.6 hectares. Also, last day, the occupiers shelled Kharkiv with a corrected aerial bomb. The impact occurred on the territory of the construction of a residential complex in the Kholodnohirskyi district of the city, with no casualties. The occupiers also hit the Zolocheva village of the Zolochiv community of the Bogodukhiv district with a KAB. There, as a result of shelling, 6 private houses, 2 farm buildings and three cars were damaged. In the village of Lisne of the Malodanyliv community of the Kharkiv district, shelling caused a fire in the ecosystem: grass and branches burned on an area of ​​500 square meters. and forest litter on an area of ​​1 hectare. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that as a result of enemy shelling, the Kupyan region was injured four people.

Title: The Minister of Defense of Ukraine met with the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Lithuania
Description: This was reported by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. -Together with our allies, we must stop this. Ukraine's priorities remain the same: strengthening air defense and increasing opportunities to strike at the enemy. We need more air defense systems and missiles to protect our skies and strengthen our defenses. In addition, Lithuania is providing EUR 10 million to support our long-range capabilities, including funding for the Paljanitsa drone missile. This will help us to resist the aggressor even more effectively,- said Defense Minister Rustem Umyerov. Mr. Landsbergis confirmed that Lithuania will continue to actively support Ukraine in the international arena. -I thank Lithuania for its decisive support in this difficult time. I believe that together we will be able to achieve victory and peace,- concluded the Minister of Defense of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, Lithuania is ready to increase support of Ukrainian defense production.

Title: The enemy shelled Sumy region 6 times
Description: This was reported by the Sumy Regional Military Administration on the morning of September 14. The communities of Krasnopilsk, Bilopolsk and Khotynsk came under fire. The enemy carried out airstrikes with anti-aircraft missiles (3 explosions) in the Khotyn community. The Russians shelled the Krasnopil community with artillery (7 explosions). KAB airstrikes (7 explosions) were recorded in the Bilopol community. As reported by ArmyInform, on the morning of September 13, the Russians carried out an airstrike on the Yampil community of the Shostky district of the Sumy region.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Defense Minister Rustem Umyerov held talks with his Danish counterpart
Description: This was reported by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. -He thanked the government and the people of Denmark for their faith in the victory of Ukraine and their significant contribution to the fight against the aggressor. Denmark became the first country to invest in the development of Ukraine's defense industry — we call it the -Danish model.- In particular, it directly financed the production of Ukrainian equipment for more than 50 million euros. We discussed the dynamics on the battlefield, the enemy's plans and our urgent needs,- Rustem Umyerov said. He reminded: every day the Russian aviation carries out about 200 sorties and launches up to 150 bombs. -To stop Russia's air superiority, we need to strengthen air defense, we need air superiority. Denmark plays a key role in this by training our pilots and has also provided the F-16s, which have already proven their effectiveness. I am grateful to Denmark for its strong support and am confident that our cooperation will help ensure a free future for Ukraine and Europe,- the Minister of Defense noted. As reported by ArmyInform, Denmark allocates $116 million for military support of Ukraine.

Title: 72 out of 76 were shot down, and 2 flew to Russia — the results of the night repulse of the attack b...
Description: This was reported on September 14 by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The air attack was repulsed by aviation, anti-aircraft missile troops, units of electronic warfare and mobile fire groups of the Defense Forces of Ukraine. As a result of anti-aircraft combat, 72 enemy attack UAVs were shot down within the Odesa, Mykolaiv, Kherson, Poltava, Kharkiv, Kyiv, Donetsk, Zhytomyr, Dnipropetrovsk, Cherkasy, Vinnytsia and Sumy regions. In addition, two enemy drones were lost in location on the territory of Ukraine, two more returned to Russia. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy used /a> 73 anti-aircraft guns and 567 kamikaze drones.

Title: The enemy attacked 43 times in the Kurakhiv direction and 28 in the Pokrovsky direction — the Genera...
Description: This was reported on the morning of September 14 by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The aggressor carried out airstrikes in the areas of populated areas, in particular, Pavlivka, Okhtyrka, Yampil, Kisla Dubina, Novoehorivka, Bondarne, Chasiv Yar, Kostyantynivka, Toretsk, Shcherbynivka, Petrivka, Leonidivka, Druzhba, Selidove, Vozdvizhenka, Bilytske, Oleksandropil, Vugledar, Ivanovka, Novodanilivka, Novopavlivka, Mykolaivka, Odradokamyanka and Kozatske. Yesterday, the aviation and missile forces and artillery of the Defense Forces made eight strikes on the areas of concentration of personnel and anti-aircraft defenses of the enemy, as well as on the command post, the S-300 radar and two anti-aircraft vehicles of the occupiers. Four battles were fought in the Kharkiv direction. Defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Vovchansk, Gatysh, Hlyboky and Liptsi. In the Kupyansk direction, 11 skirmishes took place near Synkivka, Hlushkivka, Lozova, Petropavlivka, Novoosynovo, and Stelmakhivka. In the Lymansky direction, according to detailed information, the enemy attacked 24 times near Kopanok, Grekivka, Tverdokhlibovo, Makiivka, Nevsky, Yampolivka, Torsky, Serebryanka, and Bilogorivka. There were three combat clashes in the Siverskyi direction. Ukrainian defenders repelled the assaults of the Russian invaders near Verkhnyokamyanskyi, Spirnyi and Vyimka. In the Kramatorsk direction, there were four combat clashes in the areas of Chasovoy Yar and Andriivka. In the direction of Toretsk, the Russians attacked six times near Dachny, Toretsk and Nelipivka. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders repelled 28 enemy assaults in the areas of Zelene Pole, Vozdvizhenka, Novooleksandrivka, Myrolyubivka, Novotroitske, Selidove, Mykhaylvka, Novogrodivka, and Grodivka settlements. In the direction of Kurakhiv, the Defense Forces repelled 43 enemy attacks in the direction of Ukranian, Zhelanny Pershyi, Georgiivka, Kostyantynivka, and Katerynivka. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy advanced ten times near Katerynivka, Ugledar and Zolotaya Niva. In the Dnieper direction, the enemy was defeated, attacking the defensive lines of the Ukrainians five times. On the Orihiv and Gulyaipil directions, the situation has not changed much. No signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected in the Volyn and Poliske directions. On the border with the Chernihiv and Sumy regions, the enemy maintains a military presence, carries out mortar and artillery attacks on populated areas from the territory of the Russian Federation. At the same time, our soldiers continue to actively inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying forces, exhausting the enemy along the entire line of battle. In general, the total losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,210 people last day. Our soldiers also destroyed three tanks, 40 armored combat vehicles, 25 artillery systems, anti-aircraft guns, one anti-aircraft vehicle, 36 BpLA operational-tactical level, 71 vehicles and 13 units of special equipment. -Join the ranks of the Armed Forces! Our strength is unity! -Glory to Ukraine!- - said in a message from the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy lost more than 1,200 soldiers, 25 guns, one anti-aircraft missile and one anti-aircraft gun each.

Title: The enemy launched more than 70 martyrs across Ukraine — the President
Description: Volodymyr Zelenskyy announced this on the morning of September 14. -I thank the soldiers of the army aviation, mobile fire groups and air defense, who in the Kyiv, Cherkasy, Zhytomyr, Vinnytsia, Odesa, Sumy, Dnipropetrovsk, Poltava, Kherson, Kharkiv and Donetsk regions protected Ukrainians all night long. Thank you for protecting the sky!- the President wrote. He reminded that Ukraine needs more opportunities to strengthen the air shield, air defense and long-range in order to continue to protect the lives of Ukrainians. -We are working on this with all partners of Ukraine,- assured Volodymyr Zelenskyi. As reported by ArmyInform, 9 -shahedivs- were destroyed at once in Odesa -.

Title: -Baba Yaga- buried the Russians in their hideout in the Pokrovsky direction
Description: The video appeared on September 14 on the brigade channel. -The occupiers were -burnt out at work- at night. The Russians tried to hide from drones and artillery, but in the end they got both in the person of Baba Yaga. A heavy attack UAV completely destroyed the shelter along with its contents,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the Ci4 Team 4 unit of the mechanized battalion of the Presidential Brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytsky showed the work of their night bombers.

Title: The enemy lost more than 1,200 soldiers, 25 guns, one anti-aircraft missile and one anti-aircraft gu...
Description: Information about the losses was made public on the morning of September 14 by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The losses were estimated as follows: personnel — 1,210, tanks — 3, armored combat vehicles — 40, artillery systems — 25, anti-aircraft missiles — 1, air defense means — 1, airplanes — 0, helicopters — 0, operational-tactical UAVs — 36, cruise missiles — 0, ships/boats — 0, submarines — 0, automotive equipment and tank trucks — 71, special equipment — 13 As reported by ArmyInform, aircraft, artillery systems and 1,270 infantrymen: General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reports on enemy losses per day.

Title: The Minister of Defense congratulated on the Day of Tank Troops
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine reported this on September 14. -Congratulations on the Day of Tank Troops! Ukrainian tankers, you are the steel pillar of our Independence. In extremely difficult conditions, your tanks quickly attack, breaking through the enemy's ranks, and during the defense - skillfully hold back the enemy's onslaught. Thank you for your bravery in numerous operations that bring the liberation of Ukrainian land from the occupiers closer. May your shots always be accurate and your armor impenetrable. Eternal memory to the tank soldiers who gave their lives for the freedom of our country. Glory to Ukraine!- wrote Rustem Umyerov. The Minister's greeting was accompanied by a video: As ArmyInform reported, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov commented the exchange of prisoners of war, which took place on September 13.

Title: In Odesa region, 9 martyrs were killed at once
Description: This was reported on the morning of September 14 by the Naval Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. -The Navy of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, together with the units of other components of the Defense Forces, continue to destroy the enemy on land, in the sea and in the air!- - said the message. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of September 13, 2024 the enemy attacked with 26 attack UAVs of the Shahed type (launch areas: Primorsko-Akhtarsk — Russian Federation, Chauda — Crimea).

Title: The enemy used 73 anti-aircraft missiles and 567 kamikaze drones — General Staff of the Armed Forces
Description: Operational information on the state of affairs at the front was made public by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Today, the enemy launched one missile attack on the territory of Ukraine using one missile, 63 air strikes (used, in particular, 73 anti-aircraft missiles), used to destroy 567 kamikaze drones. He carried out more than 2,900 shellings of the positions of our troops and settlements. In the Kharkiv direction, the Russians attacked four times near Vovchansk, Gatysh, Hlyboky, and Lyptsi. Two combat clashes are ongoing. According to preliminary estimates, the aggressor's losses for today are 72 soldiers killed and wounded, our soldiers also destroyed an armored combat vehicle, 25 UAVs and a car, damaged two artillery systems, two cars and an armored combat vehicle. In the Kupyansk direction, the enemy tried 11 times during the day to advance to our positions near Synkivka, Hlushkivka, Lozova, Petropavlivka, Novoosynovo, and Stelmakhivka. The enemy's attacks were repulsed by the Defense Forces. In the Lyman direction, the invading army attacked 22 times in the areas of Kopanok, Grekivka, Tverdokhlibovo, Makiivka, Nevsky, Yampolivka, Torsky, Serebryanka, and Bilogorivka. Six skirmishes are still going on, the rest have been stopped by our soldiers. On the Siverskyi direction, the occupiers tried three times during the day to break through our defenses in the areas of Verkhnokamianske, Spirne and Vyimka settlements. Three combat clashes were recorded in the Kramatorsk direction. All attacks near Chasovoy Yar and Andriivka choked. The invaders suffered losses. In the Toretsk direction, six enemy attacks took place near Dachny, Toretsk and Nelipivka. Five attacks repulsed, the battle continues. The situation is under control. The enemy tried 19 times to penetrate our defenses in the Pokrovsky direction. Since the beginning of the day, the occupiers in the areas of Zelene Pole, Vozdvizhenka, Novooleksandrivka, Myrolyubivka, Novotroitske, and Grodivka have been repulsed by our defenders 16 times. Three attacks continue in the areas of Selidove, Mykhaylvka and Novogrodivka. The enemy is suffering significant losses - according to preliminary information, today our soldiers neutralized more than 200 occupiers in this direction, 80 of them – irrevocably Two mortars and seven cars of the occupiers were destroyed, as well as the artillery system, two armored combat vehicles and four cars were damaged. The situation is difficult in the Kurakhiv direction, where the enemy attacked our positions 35 times near Ukrainian, Zhelanny Pershy, Georgiyivka, Kostyantynivka, and Katerynivka. He was most active in the Kostyantynivka and Ukranian districts. Currently, Ukrainian soldiers have repelled 30 attacks, five clashes are still ongoing. In the Vremivsk direction, our troops repelled seven enemy attacks, near Katerynivka, Vugledar and Zolotaya Niva — five attacks were repelled, two more are in progress. In the Dnieper direction, the enemy made five unsuccessful attempts to storm the positions of Ukrainian soldiers. There were no significant changes in the rest of the directions. The Defense Forces of Ukraine continue to conduct operations in the Kursk region. -Today, the soldiers of the 79th Separate Tavrian Airborne Assault Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine should be recognized for their effective and professional combat work, who effectively destroy the enemy, causing him losses in manpower and equipment. Glory to the Ukrainian soldiers! -Glory to Ukraine!- - said in a message from the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kurakhiv direction fell almost a third of all enemy attacks.

Title: -Fin- and his Norwegian Leopard: battles in Zaporizhzhia, tricks of the Russians in the East and the...
Description: During the war, -Fin- worked in the banking sector for the third year, before the large-scale invasion of Russia. After the mobilization, he took part in the Kharkiv operation, fought in Zaporozhye during the counteroffensive last year, and now he is in Donetsk region, together with his comrades, destroying the enemy on Leopard 2A4 tanks. -Fin- was among the first tankers who started working on German tanks that arrived in Ukraine last year from Western partners. ArmyInform tells its story on the occasion of Tank Troops Day. — I encountered a large-scale invasion at home in the Buchansky district of the Kyiv region. Heard how they started bombing Gostomel airport. The first explosion occurred at approximately 5:30 am. -Then I ran out into the street, and within a few minutes I learned from the news that the war had begun,- the serviceman recalls. -Fin- studied banking and graduated from the military department as a tank platoon commander. After studying, he worked in a bank, and already in October 2022 he was mobilized and assigned to the tank platoon commander, then still in the 4th tank brigade: - At first, they worked with T-64 and T-72 tanks. These were our main tanks, working in the Kharkiv direction. Later, -Fin- was offered to go to study on foreign equipment, while at first they were not even informed that it would be Leopard tanks. - Later we were already informed that we were going to study on foreign equipment, namely on Leopard 2A4 tanks. The training took place in Poland for about 40 days. -Fin- assures that this term is enough to master new tanks, because all servicemen already had significant combat experience. — Many who passed through Bakhmut took part in the Kharkiv operation. Tanks almost all go the same way. And it was very easy for us, as we just started studying, adds -Fin-. In Poland, he was trained on a Polish tank, and when he returned to Ukraine, he got one of the Leopards that Norway gave him. Currently, a whole tank coalition of countries is working, which transfers tanks of various modifications to Ukraine. — Tanks from different countries are slightly different in equipment, have different machine guns. There is also a difference in the devices, -night lights-, some of which have rear view cameras. But in general, the differences are not such that they cannot be understood or require additional training, explains -Fin-. His unit has been working at Leopards for a year and a half. -Fin- received one of the first such tanks that arrived in Ukraine. — I had my first combat use on this tank during a counteroffensive in the Zaporizhzhia region in 2023, the settlement of Mala Tokmachka. They went on the attack, started working. The enemy fired heavily at us, using FPV drones a lot. In the end, we completed the task and retreated to more advantageous positions to save the lives of the crew, save the equipment, the tank remained intact, - recalls -Fin-. After such an attack, many traces of artillery shells remained on the equipment. Tankers say that the Russians, on the one hand, are afraid of the Leopards, but on the other hand, they also hunt them, consider Western equipment a priority target. — There were cases of drone strikes, the commander of a tank with the call sign -Chechen- was killed in mine. He was hit by a -lancet- directly in the commander's hatch, he died on the spot. The crew survived, but the commander died, says -Fin-. Currently, the tanks of the 33rd brigade are performing combat tasks in the eastern direction and are holding back the advance of the Russian invaders. — the Russians are constantly trying to trick us. But we are not the first day in the war, so we know their tricks. -Leopards- are used precisely in tank battles, we engage in direct fire so that the target is 2.5-3 kilometers away, - notes -Fin-, and about Russian -analogovnet- tanks, such as the T-90M -Proryv-, says the following: — Tanks are all destroyed, all are burning. The key is knowing where to shoot. Crews are officially paid for each destroyed unit of enemy equipment. It's also an added motivation to destroy them more. — One of the crews destroyed two BMPs at once. They left and worked very quickly. -Leopard- has an excellent sight, sees far, plus speed. They just saw two BMPs in an open area and immediately stopped them with two shots. After that, they immediately rolled back -into a hole- so that neither artillery nor drones could catch up. We work at speed: there is a task, there is a goal, we worked quickly and hid, explains -Fin-. He adds that the Soviet tanks, which are also in the armed brigade, mainly work from closed positions, that is, as artillery and cover. — Nowadays, we often conduct training, because we do not know what will await us in the future. We may have to ford or ford a river. Bridges are often blown up, and we have to be ready for that, says the tank company commander. Currently, the 33rd brigade is also actively recruiting, in addition, experienced commanders can already train new arrivals themselves. — There is still a lack of highly qualified personnel, namely tank commanders. We have guys who were anti-tank fighters who joined us. We ourselves trained them on the training grounds, and now they skillfully perform combat tasks. That is, they were anti-tankers, but they became tankers. Tankers who work on foreign equipment constantly exchange experience in the operation of tanks and their use in combat operations. — My colleague studied in Britain on Challenger tanks, and we constantly exchange information about what we or they are better at, what are our weaknesses. We support the contact. -Fin- emphasizes that an important quality for a tanker is the ability to work in a crew. — The crew is one unit, they must work together. There has to be trust between them in order to move out and complete the task. And you also need perseverance to study, to learn the technique. Constantly working and training. There are no longer any height requirements. -I have a platoon leader who is 192 cm tall and he's quite comfortable,- adds -Fin- with a smile. Photo by Olena Khudyakova

Title: Distinguishes drones from birds: what is known about the radars that the Netherlands will transfer t...
Description: As reported ArmyInform, the corresponding contract was arranged by the Ministry of Defense of the Kingdom with Robin Radar Systems in The Hague. Robin Radar Systems radars are designed to detect small drones, distinguishing them from other objects such as birds. A unique feature of certain radar samples from the Dutch manufacturer is their ability to work while driving on a vehicle, which ensures increased operational capabilities. The mobile nature of these radars makes them difficult for adversaries to detect and neutralize, providing continuous detection of air threats. These radars will play a crucial role in countering Russian drone attacks, providing a significant defense capability for Ukraine. The MAX, ELVIRA and IRIS radars offered by Robin Radar Systems provide advanced drone detection and tracking solutions suitable for a variety of environments. With its 360-degree 3D coverage, the MAX radar can detect and track thousands of moving objects simultaneously, providing real-time updates and accurate data through rapid rotation. Designed for airports and wind farms, it is particularly suitable for environments where flight safety is critical. ELVIRA, a 2D radar specifically designed for drone detection, uses advanced technologies such as micro-Doppler classification to effectively distinguish UAVs from other objects while offering easy integration with command and control systems. Robin Radar Iris® is a short-range X-band 3D radar designed for drone detection and identification. It is a frequency-modulated continuous-wave radar with two independent radio frequency systems, two pairs of antennas diametrically opposed to transmit and receive. IRIS is a lightweight 3D radar that deploys in less than 15 minutes and can detect drones at speeds of up to 100 km/h, making it ideal for rapid deployment in the field. The weight of these radars is 29 kg, they deploy in 15 minutes and provide a circular view, the instrument range of which is up to 5 km. The systems can detect UAVs weighing 3 kg from a distance of 4 km and 1.4 kg from 2 km. -This three-coordinate radar operates in the X-Band range, that is, at a wavelength of 3.75-2.5 cm and at a frequency of 8-12 GHz. The beam width is 6 degrees and the scan speed is 1 second, the analysts said. -As for the ability to work while driving, speeds up to 100 km/h and angles up to 10 degrees are allowed.- Also exists project integration of Robin Radar's IRIS with OpenWorks Engineering's Vision Flex CUAS optical autonomous surveillance system, which increases the effectiveness of target detection and recognition. Experts from IKK Defense Express believe that these small-sized installations will be an ideal addition to the work of small fire groups , which are engaged in identifying targets. They can also come in handy for cover from threats during marches, experts emphasize. In the context of the war in Ukraine, where drones are increasingly being used for reconnaissance and attacks, these radars will help provide valuable capabilities to counter the aerial threat. Their ability to quickly detect, track and classify drones will allow Ukrainian forces to better anticipate and neutralize drone attacks, strengthening their defenses against airstrikes. IRIS radar from the Robin Radar company. Video: Robin Radar Systems IRIS® drone detection radar. Video: Robin Radar Systems

Title: Throw a shadow on NATO to hide its hybrid attacks: how and why Russia lies about UAVs
Description: The purpose of this narrative is obvious — to show the Russians as if they are fighting against the entire -Western world- and to accuse Ukraine's partners of escalation. Information is being actively circulated in the Russian information space that the territory of NATO countries is allegedly being used by the Armed Forces to launch UAVs. For example, during the drone attack on the Murmansk region on September 11, Russian information launderers spread the news that one of the Ukrainian UAVs had arrived from the territory of Norway, a NATO member. The Kremlin has long sought to involve NATO in a war in order to lose not only Ukraine, but the entire -collective west-. According to the Kremlin dictator, such a reason for the unsuccessful completion of -svo- should have satisfied the domestic Russian audience. That is why Russian drones and missiles have repeatedly invaded the airspace of at least five NATO member states and two other European states. Moldova, which is particularly suffering from the consequences of Russian attacks, has repeatedly recorded cases of missile and drone debris falling on its territory, and Romania even activates the air alarm signal during Russian air attacks and has built shelters in border areas. On September 7, the Russian-Iranian -shahed- fell for the first time in Latvia, as a result of which the country announced the strengthening of air defense on its eastern borders. It is no secret for Ukraine that Russia has been waging a hybrid war against the entire civilized world for a long time. This is manifested in cyber attacks, systematic violation of airspace by fighter jets, particularly over the Baltic Sea, aggressive propaganda through the media and the church, funding of pro-Russian organizations and individual politicians. And the West's accusations of escalation, which periodically come from the Russians, are just an attempt to shift responsibility for their actions onto someone else.

Title: Utility discount in a few clicks: how to issue a discount remotely
Description: ArmyInform tells who can use this service and what needs to be done. Previously, beneficiaries had to submit several applications. The first is about registering a war veteran, and the second is actually about assigning a benefit for housing and communal services. Currently, one application is submitted. And it's simplified. The point is that a significant amount of data is now collected automatically through electronic information exchange between public registries. By the way, family members of a veteran can apply for benefits. This can be done both by those who have already retired from the ranks of the Defense Forces of Ukraine, and by those who are still serving. For the latter, such an option can come in handy, because it is not so easy to personally visit various government institutions during service. Vacations are not big enough to waste time on. The result of the application review can be tracked in the section -My applications- - -application status-. Currently, the benefit for the payment of housing and communal services is provided in cash. By default, the Pension Fund can open an account in Oschadbank and inform the beneficiary about it. And the beneficiary must sign the bank account agreement. If you want the money to be transferred to an account in another bank, you need to apply to the territorial body of the Pension Fund. For registration, you need to provide your account, where the money will be deposited. It usually takes some time for registration and billing. But later the money comes. In general, the benefit involves the following process - you pay the full amount for housing and communal services, which are indicated in the payments. But you receive funds on the card in the form of compensation. It should be remembered that if you do not pay for the utility bill, the benefits may stop. We would like to remind you that the discount on the payment of housing and communal services is not the only benefit provided to the participants of hostilities. More about social guarantees read here. If you have not yet registered the status of a combatant, but there are grounds for its registration, we also wrote about the options how UBD can be issued now.

Title: In Poland, the NATO-Ukraine JATEC Center - Ministry of Defense officially started its work
Description: About this reported on September 13 by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The decision to create JATEC was approved at the NATO summit in Washington in July this year. The center is located in the Polish city of Bydgoszcz. -The joint center with NATO will help Ukraine not only to implement procedures, approaches and standards, but also to share its own experience. Interoperability is one of our main goals and we are taking concrete steps for it. We have submitted our proposals for the implementation of the projects and are waiting for substantive decisions,- Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Stanislav Hayder commented on the event. Assistant Secretary General of the Alliance Thomas Goffus, Commander of the NATO Strategic Command for Transformations General Philippe Lavin, First Deputy Chief of the General Staff of the Polish Armed Forces, Major General Karol Dymanovsky, Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for European Integration Oleksandr Balanutsa took part in the negotiations in Poland. The parties legally established the creation of the Center and outlined its main tasks, structure, roles and functions of the management team. The work of JATEC is aimed at achieving interoperability of the security and defense institutions of Ukraine with the relevant institutions of the Alliance, improving the quality of education, increasing the analytical component and training personnel. The parties agreed that the establishment of the Center should be formally completed in October-November of this year. -The opening of a joint center with NATO is a real step towards the integration of Ukraine into the structure of the Alliance. Membership in NATO is not a political slogan, but the implementation of specific projects. We are gradually moving towards becoming a full-fledged part of the bloc, and the opening of JATEC brings us closer to this,- Oleksandr Balanutsa said during the event. Another topic of negotiations is ensuring the work of the Center, namely the need to provide resources from NATO for the implementation of measures and the development of an information and communication network. Representatives of Ukraine and NATO also agreed on the need to launch projects within the framework of JATEC as soon as possible. In particular, the Ukrainian side handed over a list of 70 projects for joint work and suggested which of them should become priorities. As reported by ArmyInform, the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Stanislav Hayder during a meeting in Kyiv informed experts of the European Union about the course and results of reforms in the field of defense.

Title: Came, fled, died - our drones showed the typical path of an occupier on Ukrainian soil
Description: The video appeared on September 13 on the unit's channel. -Friday the 13th is one of the most common superstitions in Ukraine! But it will be one of the most unlucky days for Rashist, just like every day of his stay on Ukrainian, blooming land,- commented the video in -Adam-. As ArmyInform reported, the Adam tactical group demonstrated the run of two Russians to a dilapidated house in which they wanted to hide from our drones.

Title: Exposure, suspicion, special investigation: law enforcement officers in the Kupyan region worked har...
Description: The law enforcement officers exposed a 49-year-old woman who worked as a clerk in the occupation administration. During the capture of the village of Dvorichna in the Kupyan District, a local resident voluntarily supported the Russian invaders. She assumed the position of -executive chief specialist of the paperwork sector of the Dvurechan territorial administration of the Temporary Civil Administration of the Kupyan district of the Kharkiv region.- The woman organized the documents and their further verification, formed cases and handed them over to the leadership of the occupation administration. Also, an official of the occupation administration was engaged in the formation of applications from local residents for further payment of -material aid- in Russian rubles. After the liberation of the district from the Russian invaders, the accomplice of the occupiers tried to avoid legal responsibility, but she was exposed. Also, the prosecutor's office in absentia notified about suspicion due to the fact of collaborative activity to a 37-year-old man who helped invaders to -legally take- Ukrainian enterprises into the property of the Russian Federation. During the occupation of the city of Kupyansk, he voluntarily agreed to cooperate with the Russian invaders, and in July 2022 he deliberately assumed the position of -executive chief specialist of the Department of Economic Development of the Military-Gradient Administration of the Kupyan District of the Kharkiv Region.- The man, on the instructions of the occupation leadership, carried out an inventory of communal and state enterprises, and also drew up -reports- based on its results. On the basis of these -documents-, the occupiers have already illegally transferred captured Ukrainian enterprises to the property of the aggressor state. Before the de-occupation of Kharkiv Oblast by the Defense Forces of Ukraine, the collaborator fled to the Russian Federation together with the Russian military. Law enforcement officers raised the issue of declaring him wanted. Also, the prosecutors completed a special investigation and sent to the court an indictment against the Kupyan city council member for the fact of collaborative activity. During the occupation of the city by the armed forces of the Russian Federation, she voluntarily cooperated with the Russian occupiers. In July 2022, the invaders appointed a woman to the position of -and. at. chief physician of the communal enterprise -Kupyanskoe territorial medical association- of the Ministry of Health of the Kharkiv Oblast Regional State Administration. Before the large-scale invasion of the Russian Federation into Ukraine, the woman worked as a cardiologist, so she had relevant work experience and skills that she used when working for the invaders. The newly minted -leader- coordinated the work of subordinate employees, followed the instructions of the occupation leadership and even managed to appear in a Russian propaganda video. In the video, the -chief doctor- talked about receiving the so-called -human aid with medicines- from the Russian Federation, thus creating a positive image of the aggressor country. The woman performed her duties until the moment of deoccupation. She is currently hiding from Ukrainian law enforcement officers. The accused has been declared wanted, she will be tried in absentia. A woman faces up to ten years of imprisonment with deprivation of the right to hold certain positions or engage in certain activities for a period of up to fifteen years and confiscation of property. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that this week, according to the materials The court of the State Bureau of Investigation sentenced 5 defectors, indictments were sent to the court against 3 collaborators, 4 more persons were notified of suspicion.

Title: the Russians were left without -zemledelia- - the destruction of the newest weapons of the enemy

The operators of the 413th separate battalion of unmanned systems -Raid- worked together in cooperation with the integrated detachment of unmanned systems of the 78th assault-assault regiment -Bumblebee-.
