As a result of the anti-aircraft battle, 44 attack UAVs were shot down. Three enemy drones flew back to Russia, four more were lost in location on the territory of Ukraine (information about casualties and destruction was not received). As of 9:00 a.m., four attack UAVs remain in the airspace of Ukraine, combat work is underway! Due to the active countermeasures of the Defense Forces, most of the enemy missiles did not reach their intended targets. Air defense worked in Kyiv, Kherson, Khmelnytskyi, Cherkasy, Sumy, Dnipropetrovsk, Kirovohrad, Zaporizhzhya and Poltava regions. As reported by ArmyInform, our arta damaged two important objects objects of the Russian invaders.

Title: Among the 11 victims of the Russian attacks in the Kherson region is a child
Description: This was reported by Oleksandr Prokudin, head of Kherson OVA. Antonivka, Prydniprovske, Kizomys, Sadove, Veletenske, Bilozerka, Tokarivka, Mykhailivka, Olhivka, Novovorontsovka came under enemy fire and airstrikes last day. The following settlements were also affected by Russian strikes: Lviv, Odradokamyanka, Mykolaivka, Burgunka, Trudolyubivka, Dovhovo, Nova Kuban, Zarichne, Osokorivka, Chervyn Mayak, Olhyne, Kozatske and the city of Kherson. In addition, the Russian military targeted the Point of Invincibility, residential quarters of populated areas of the region, including 11 private houses. The occupiers also damaged private cars. The head of the OVA noted that during the night drone attack, the Air Defense Forces destroyed 4 Shahed-131/136 over the territory of the region. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day occupiers 337 times 11 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region were beaten.

Title: It didn't help. Prince drones destroyed an enemy mortar, which was disguised as a garbage can
Description: The video of the combat work was released on September 12 on the brigade channel. -One, two, three! Mortar mountains! That is how, instantly, the air reconnaissance units of the Princely Brigade and the Haron strike group worked. Just a moment — and the enemy mortar from BC burst into flames and turned into scrap metal!-, the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the drones of the princely brigade burned the Russian RSZV right on fire.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Our artillery damaged two important objects of the Russian invaders
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. However, our soldiers continue to actively inflict significant losses in equipment and manpower on the occupying troops, exhaust the offensive potential of the enemy along the entire front line and in the rear. Over the past 24 hours, aviation and missile forces and artillery of the Defense Forces have carried out 32 strikes on the areas of concentration of personnel and anti-aircraft defenses, hit six air defense systems, three guns in firing positions, one electronic warfare station, two remote minefields and two other important objects of Russian invaders As reported by ArmiyaInform, the army of the Russian Federation stormed the positions of our defenders more than 100 times: the situation remains tense. We will remind, last day the losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1270 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 11 tanks, 17 armored combat vehicles, 73 artillery systems, two anti-aircraft guns, two air defense systems, one plane, 43 operational-tactical UAVs, 93 vehicles and two units of special equipment.

Title: The GUR showed the destruction of the Russian Su-30SM aircraft for 50 million dollars
Description: About this informs Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. It is noted that the fighter that fell into the sea belonged to the 43rd separate naval aviation regiment of the Russian Armed Forces, which is based at the airfield of the city of Saka in the temporarily occupied Crimea. -The occupiers lost contact with their battleship on September 11, 2024 at around 5 am. Approximately three hours later, the Russians launched a search and rescue operation with the involvement of the An-26 aircraft, as well as Mi-8 and Ka-27 helicopters,- the report said. At lunchtime, the invaders reported to the command about a characteristic spot from aviation fuel discovered in the sea, 70 kilometers northwest of Cape Tarkhankut, and soon they also saw the wreckage of the destroyed Su-30SM. The department noted that the cost of such an aircraft is approximately 50 million dollars.

Title: The Russian army stormed the positions of our defenders more than 100 times: the situation remains t...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of the settlements of Ivashchenkove, Volodymyrivka, Bila Bereza, Vilna Sloboda, Kindrativka, Yastrubyne, Smolyne of the Sumy region; Semenivka, Mykolaivka, Chernihiv region; Kupyansk, Kharkiv region. Shcherbynivka, Oleksandropil, Ozaryanivka, Druzhba, Chasiv Yar, Mykolaivka, Shchurove, Kostyantynivka, Vugledar, Urozhaine, Rozhivka, Velyka Novosilka, Blagodatne of the Donetsk region also came under enemy fire; Biloghirya, Zaporizhzhia region. In the Kharkiv direction the enemy continued its assault. Here, three combat clashes took place in the districts of Gatyshch, Lyptsi and Tykhoi. 16 enemy attacks were recorded in the Kupyan direction. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Lozova, Sinkivka, Hlushkivka, Stelmakhivka, and Andriivka. On the Lymansky direction our troops repelled 11 assaults by the occupiers in the districts of Makiivka, Nevsky, Terniv, Grekivka, Druzhelyubivka, and Teverdokhlibovo and Dibrova. In the Northern direction Defense forces repelled one attack near Vyimka. In the Toretsk direction, the enemy, supported by aviation, launched six attacks. He concentrated his efforts in the regions of Toretsk, Nelipivka and Dachne settlements. In the Pokrovsky direction our defenders repelled 30 attacks. The main efforts of the enemy were concentrated in the districts of Vozdvizheneka, Zeleny Polya, Novooleksandrivka, Grodivka, Novotroitsky, Novogrodivka, Selidovoy, and Mykhailivka. In the Kurakhiv direction Defense forces continue to hold back the enemy in the Kostyantynivka, Ukrainian and Georgiivka districts. In total, the enemy tried to break through the defense of our troops in this direction 23 times. On the Vremiv direction, the occupiers launched four attacks on our positions in the direction of Vugledar. The opponent had no success. On the Orihiv direction, two skirmishes took place near Malaya Tokmachka, which were unsuccessful for the enemy. No losses of positions and territories were allowed in the Dnieper direction. Ukrainian soldiers successfully repelled seven attacks by Russian invaders. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. Operational situation without significant changes. We will remind, last day the losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1270 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 11 tanks, 17 armored combat vehicles, 73 artillery systems, two anti-aircraft guns, two air defense vehicles, one plane, 43 operational-tactical UAVs, 93 vehicles and two units of special equipment.

Title: From evening to morning, the enemy hit the Dnipropetrovsk region with Hradami, artillery and drones
Description: This was reported by the head of the Dnipropetrovsk OVA, Serhiy Lysak Vorog, who beat Nikopol, Myrivska and Marganetska communities. Four private houses were gutted in the district center. One of the houses caught fire, and the fire truck was on fire. The fire was extinguished. In addition, 2 farm buildings, as many power lines and gas boilers were damaged. -There was also a lot of noise in the Chervonogrihorivska community. Dry grass was burning there. 2 private homes and 3 farm buildings were mutilated,- noted Serhiy Lysak. Fortunately, there are no dead or injured. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day occupiers 337 times 11 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region were beaten.

Title: Caliber missile carriers in the Black and Mediterranean seas continue to pose a threat
Description: The Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informed about this. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. In the Mediterranean Sea, 1 enemy ship, which is a carrier of Kalibr cruise missiles with a total salvo of up to 4 missiles. During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention for the Safety of Life at Sea of ​​1974 (SOLAS) by turning off automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, the robber -caravels- that /->remove grain from the occupied territories, will be punished.

Title: Head of the Ministry of Defense: EW specialists are Ukraine's electronic shield on the battlefield
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page. As the head of the defense department noted, -EW works- - these words explain why the enemy commander's radio communication disappears, his drone goes off course, and the cruise missile does not reach the target. Rustem Umyerov emphasized that this is the result of painstaking work of our specialists of radio electronic warfare. -I sincerely thank every serviceman of the Reb units for their round-the-clock work. You are our electronic -shield- that disrupts the occupier's control systems, suppresses his communications and blinds the enemy's fire adjusters,- the Minister of Defense emphasized. He also honored the memory of EW specialists who gave their lives for the freedom and independence of Ukraine.

Title: Aircraft, artillery systems and 1,270 infantrymen: the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine ...
Description: informs about this General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 12.09.24 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces 93 times restrained the enemy's offensives in the key areas of the front.

Title: Occupiers attack Zaporizhzhia: 337 strikes per day, infrastructure damaged
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhzhya OVA. Russian troops carried out 3 airstrikes on Biloghir and Novodanilovka. According to the information of the head of the OVA, 172 UAVs of various modifications attacked Gulyaipole, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Robotine, Mala Tokmachka, Malynivka, and Olhivske. In addition, 3 MLRS attacks covered Gulyaipole, Novodanilivka, and Preobrazhenka. Also, 159 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Orikhov, Gulyaipol, Pryutny, Novoandriyivka, Novodanilivka, Robotyny, Malaya Tokmachka, Malynyvka, and Olhivskyi. -We received 13 reports about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. Civilians were not harmed,- noted Ivan Fedorov. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of September 12 the enemy carried out a massive airstrike on energy facilities and civil infrastructure of the Konotop community of the Sumy region.

Title: The defense forces held back enemy offensives on key areas of the front 93 times
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In the Kharkiv direction, the occupiers launched three attacks near Gatysh, Liptsi and Tikhoi. Units of the Defense Forces have successfully repulsed two offensive actions of the enemy, another battle is ongoing. According to preliminary information, the enemy lost 108 soldiers killed and wounded, and Ukrainian servicemen destroyed two armored vehicles, two artillery systems, four units of automotive and two units of special equipment. In addition, six artillery systems, one armored combat vehicle and six enemy vehicles were damaged. In the Kupyansk direction Defense forces repelled 16 enemy attacks in the Lozova, Sinkivka, Hlushkivka, Stelmakhivka area and Andriyivka, three clashes are still ongoing, the situation is under control. Ten times the enemy attacked in the Lyman direction, trying to advance in the direction of the settlements of Makiivka, Nevsky, Terniv, Grekivka, Druzhelyubivka, and Teverdokhlibovo, where our defenders successfully repelled all attacks. In the Seversk direction, our defenders successfully repelled one enemy assault in the Vyimka area. With the support of aviation, the enemy tried five times to wedge into our defense on the Toretsk direction. During the day, the occupiers attacked the positions of Ukrainian defenders near the settlements of Toretsk, Nelipivka and Dachne. In the Pokrovsky direction in the areas of the settlements of Vozdvizhenka, Zeleny Polya, Novooleksandrivka, Grodivka, Novotroitskyi, Novogrodivka, Selidovoy and Mykhailivka, our troops repelled 30 offensive and assault actions of the enemy. According to preliminary data, the enemy lost 276 people, two tanks, two artillery systems, two armored vehicles were also destroyed , seven cars and two units of enemy special equipment. One more tank, two armored combat vehicles and one enemy artillery system were damaged. In the Kurakhiv direction there were 22 combat clashes. The invaders remain active, trying to advance in the districts of Kostyantynivka, Ukranian and Georgiivka. At the moment, there are eight clashes. In the Vremiv direction, the occupiers launched eight attacks in the direction of Vugledar. All of them have been repelled, the situation is under control. In the Orihiv direction our troops repelled two enemy attacks near Malaya Tokmachka, the enemy was unsuccessful. In the Dnieper direction, the situation has not undergone significant changes, no losses of positions and territories have been allowed. Ukrainian soldiers successfully stopped four assaults by Russian invaders. The department honored the soldiers of the 35th separate brigade of marines named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Ostrogradsky, who confidently hold the lines and inflict significant losses on the enemy. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kurakhiv direction Russian troops storm in small groups and in recent days almost do not use armored vehicles.

Title: A massive airstrike on energy and civilians in Sumy Oblast injured more than 10 people
Description: informs Sumy OVA about this. It is noted that the Russians used UAVs of the Shahed type, directing them to residential buildings, educational and medical institutions. According to preliminary information, as a result of the enemy attack, 13 people were injured of various degrees of severity. Emergency services are on the scene. The consequences of the airstrike are being eliminated. Information about the consequences is being clarified. People are given all the necessary help. Expanded points of invincibility. As reported by ArmyInform, two people were killed and two were injured as a result of the shelling of Konstantinopol of the Velikonovosilkiv community in Donetsk region.

Title: In the Kherson region, the unusual boats of the occupiers were destroyed for the first time
Description: About this on the air Army TV said the spokesman of the -Tavria- OUV, Captain Dmytro Lykhovi. -There, the nature of the area is such that there are many straits, various mouths of the Dnieper, and the Russians use boats for logistics, and during the repulse of attacks, these boats are destroyed,- Dmytro Lykhova said. According to him, three enemy boats were hit yesterday, six the day before yesterday, and five more the day before that. -What's interesting is that, for the first time, I see in the report that yesterday, in addition to the boats they use to cross the straits, two radio-controlled boats were destroyed. This is another way of conducting hostilities,- the spokesman added. As reported by ArmiyaInform, Russian troops in the South changed the directions of assault operations in the Orichiv and Dnieper directions.

Title: The head of the Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs lied again: about what this time
Description: This happened after participation in the Strategic Dialogue between the Russian Federation and the Cooperation Council of the Arab States of the Persian Gulf. The head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation said: -We never wanted someone else's land. We wanted people who are part of the -Russian world- to be treated humanely. This absurd and false statement by Lavrov shows that the Russian government is generally detached from reality and lives in its own -bubble-. The whole world knows that the Russian Federation is an occupier and an invader. If Russia did not seek to seize someone else's land, then why did it change its own constitution to include six administrative-territorial units of Ukraine? Moreover, Russia cynically destroys precisely those regions where the Russian-speaking population mainly lived. According to the Office of the Prosecutor General, during the period of the large-scale invasion, as of September 10, almost 150,000 crimes of aggression and war crimes against the Russian Federation, more than 18,000 crimes against national security, and more than 2,000 crimes against children were registered. I wonder if, according to Lavrov's sick logic, after the liberation of part of the Kursk region, where the government of the Russian Federation refused to ensure the interests of its own citizens, Russia itself has the right to be territorially intact?

Title: Leading cities and what will be new in the fall: how the recruiting campaign in Ukraine continues. I...
Description: What are the most in-demand positions today? But in the end, do recruiting centers solve the problem of the lack of people in the army? ArmiyaInform asked about all this during a blitz interview with Oleksiy Bezhevets, the authorized representative of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine on recruiting issues. — A few numbers: how many open recruiting centers do we have as of the beginning of September? What cities are in the plans? — The network is developing. We currently have 34 recruiting centers. Kraynaya was opened in Uman, before that there was Chernivtsi. There are, of course, plans to open new recruiting centers. As always, we do not announce the city: first we open, then we talk about it. But about 10 more such centers are in the process of preparation. Currently, we have literally a few regions left in Ukraine where centers are not yet present. And in all these regions, preparatory work is underway. Moreover, we are talking not only about regional centers, but also district ones, where the local authorities, in cooperation with us, have decided that it is advisable to do this. Therefore, by the end of October, at most in November, there will not be a single region of Ukraine without a Ukrainian army recruiting center. At the end of autumn, there will be at least 40 of them, as I can see from the dynamics at the moment. As for statistics, more than 16,000 people applied to recruiting centers as of the beginning of September. That is, all these people received counseling. Yes, there are a certain number of people who could not find vacancies for one reason or another: either quite specific requirements, or a specific profile of the corresponding candidate, which may not be suitable for military service, or some other specific characteristics. After all, the part determines whether the candidate is suitable for the vacant position and whether the part wants to see a person with the corresponding characteristics in him. Therefore, we are now simultaneously launching the process of reviewing the status of those candidates who have not been selected for vacancies, but who have taken the initiative and voluntarily decided to join the ranks of the Defense Forces. The goal: to work additionally with everyone who has expressed a desire, but has not yet been able to become a military serviceman. We also have an active communication campaign, which will now be intensified in various channels: outdoor advertising, additional online activities, etc. Information influence plays a role because coverage and communication with communities gives us an influx of new candidates interested in positions in the military. When these communication activities subside and new information waves roll in, people forget that there is such an opportunity and live in their information bubble. Our task is to enter this information bubble and tell people about the unique opportunity to choose a position and part on their own. And then help make a choice, don't miss the chance, because the mobilization processes are ongoing. —Which city shows the most effective result in the context of people's appeals to the recruiting center? — We have four such cities: Kyiv, Lviv, Kharkiv and Zaporizhzhia. By all indicators, these are the leaders, although there are also small cities, such as Shostka. This is a small town that has organized all these processes in a cool way, and they have great results. From the point of view of the efficiency of the centers even in small cities, this is already a definite plus, they perform their work, spending minimal resources and performing very important functions for the state. Yes, let even one recruiter work there. But if he recruits even 10 volunteers motivated to protect the Motherland of people, then this is already arch-class. And if there is already such an opportunity in a small community, and people have been helped, it is important. Because every person is a separate destiny. And we helped define and shape this destiny so that a person finds himself in the protection of the Motherland. —Which recruiting center and where was the most difficult to open from an organizational point of view? Is there resistance from local authorities in this process? And which region is the friendliest? We have wonderful people, and each region really has its own specifics (smiles. Ed.). Yes, there are nuances during the opening. Someone has different standards, approaches in work, business processes, communication culture, etc. Yes, in some places the processes were more complicated, in some - the processes went as quickly as possible. There are centers that we open literally within a week, and there are regions where preparation takes months. And it seems the same result, but the effort spent on this process is many times more. —What are your expectations-forecasts for the recruitment campaign of autumn 2024? — We continue to open centers, several per month. Maybe there will be an opening every week. Now we will see the dynamics in the degree of readiness. Up to 10 recruitment centers are planned to open in the next three months. We are also planning online activities at the same time: the process of creating a recruiting center in online mode is underway. This is a recruiting model where recruiters will proactively and exclusively online communicate with people and offer them certain vacancies in the Defense Forces. That is, we are talking about the proactive position of the center: we see a person who is looking for a job, his resume is posted on a website with vacancies. And we are the first to call and offer service in the Defense Forces and a position that is as close as possible to the position a person is looking for. Also, by the end of September, we plan to launch a hotline so that people can call, consult, voice complaints, etc. We hope to maintain the momentum in terms of volunteer requests in the fall, and it will only grow. We also want to provide physical support for candidates at all stages of registration to the ranks of the Defense Forces. We are currently discussing this with one of the recruiting centers of the Armed Forces centers. We are currently working out the details of how it should work and what it will look like. This is done so that the person is calm that there is a military man next to him, who will guide him -by the hand-, relatively speaking, through all the rooms, help with all the questions that have arisen: regarding VLK, processing documents, personal affairs, etc. And it will be a soldier -in the system- who communicates in the same language with other soldiers. We hope to launch such a service soon. Let's start with Kyiv and the region. In addition, we are preparing an approach to certain categories of people who, for example, are suitable for military service, but with certain restrictions. Such people now have the opportunity to join the service. And for such military personnel, we are developing a mechanism for creating a list of vacancies where, according to the law, they can serve, there are units that are ready to accept such people and ensure that these people actually return to military life. Such a separate initiative is also currently being developed. We will also go further in the future. Perhaps we will start with Kyiv: so that a person who decides to recruit can come to Kyiv, he will be provided with temporary housing and food while he solves organizational issues. And specialists will help her to complete documents at the TCC, and so that she can go to the training center to learn military affairs in a calm manner. In addition, the approval of changes in normative documents, Cabinet resolutions, which provide for the possibility of military units to directly register a recruit without the participation of the TCC, for the period of martial law, is currently ending. This is an exception in order to simplify the process of a person entering the army as much as possible. I hope that by the end of September these changes will be accepted and will come into force. —How many vacancies in the Defense Forces are we talking about as of the beginning of September? — According to our internal database, it is about 4,000 vacancies. Plus the online database on four online job search platforms — about 10,000 more. Yes, the mosaic of vacancies in the Defense Forces is huge. And a quality search gives a cool conversion: a person who applied and is eligible for military service can actually find a good job for himself. —Which professions/positions are currently the most in demand? — Every week there are spikes for certain positions. Yes, a large number of applications were, for example, for reconnaissance. There was a separate period when gunners were looking for positions. Always relevant - UAV operators. There is also a demand for staff positions, clerks, and the IT field. —Have there been cases when citizens turn to recruiting centers with the goal of signing a contract, rather than mobilizing? — Yes. Today, that ratio is roughly 40 to 60 or 60 to 40, and the figure fluctuates from month to month. —Do recruiting centers solve the problem of lack of people in the army? — Yes, there is a trend. The situation has improved significantly (in fact, since the end of spring) with the manning of military units. Yes, there are still not enough people, but the situation has improved. The role of recruiting centers in this is essential, because a large percentage of people who join the ranks of the Defense Forces every month are volunteers. These are thousands of people every month who used this new algorithm: took a letter of recommendation, found a part and went to serve there. And there are many such people. —How do young people react to recruiting centers? Your subjective observations. — If we take global statistics, then, unfortunately, we have the following indicators regarding the demographic situation: people who were born in the 90s or at the beginning of the 2000s are simply significantly less than those who who were born in the 70s, for example. But young people also turn to recruiting centers. We explain to them that they have the opportunity to conclude a contract for one year, they are not subject to mobilization, will have the opportunity to enter a higher military educational institution, receive the rank of officer, etc. It can be a ticket to life. Yes, young people are applying, and we perfectly understand that a lot needs to be done in this area, and a lot is already being done in this area. —Do women turn to recruiting centers— what is the trend? What positions are they looking for? Who are they in civilian life? - They apply, and there are a lot of them. In Sumy region, for example, a third of the candidates with whom work is being done on job selection are from women. One in three appeals is from a woman. And the potential is just huge. A woman in the army is not necessarily only a cook, a clerk, a lawyer or a journalist. In fact, there are no legal restrictions. A woman can also get professional training for almost any position in the army and perform her duties. A large number of units are very loyal and recruit women. Moreover, for different positions: snipers, UAV operators, medics. And Chernihiv region is also a regional leader in terms of the number of women applying to recruiting centers. —Portrait of a citizen of Ukraine who applies to a recruiting center,— what is he like? Each person is a separate universe. And to make the -average temperature in the room- would probably be wrong. I don't want to speculate (smiles. — Ed). Photo by Vitaly Pavlenko and from the personal archive of Oleksiy Bezhevets

Title: Two F-16s collided during a simulated battle, one pilot survived: from NATO history
Description: The fatal incident occurred over the Greek island of Karpathos in the Aegean Sea in the context of the Aegean dispute, a conflict between two NATO member states over sovereignty and related rights in the Aegean Sea and the airspace above it. Reconstruction of a simulated dogfight between Greek and Turkish F-16s On 23 May 2006 around 12:40 local time, the Greek Air Force raised a pair of F-16 fighters to the interception of a pair of Turkish Air Force F-16s escorting an RF-4E Phantom reconnaissance aircraft over the Aegean Sea. The mission of the Turkish spy was most likely to photograph the S-300 air defense systems deployed on the island of Crete. Greek fighter pilots were ordered to intercept planes of the Turkish Air Force and to prevent them from approaching the coast of the island and taking aerial photographs of Greek objects. After the interception, Greek and Turkish fighter pilots resorted to a simulated aerial battle. The pilots of both countries strove to win by recording a conditional defeat of the enemy with the help of instruments. Maneuvering in dangerous proximity to each other, the Greek and Turkish fighter jets collided at an altitude of about 8,000 meters above sea level at a distance of 12 miles from the coast of the island of Karpathos. By <a target=-_blank- rel=-nofollow- href=-https://web.archive.org/web/20140322030232/http:/vasington.be.mfa.gov.tr/ShowAnnouncement.aspx?ID=115955 According to the Turkish Ministry of Foreign Affairs, a Greek fighter jet attacked a Turkish F-16 from behind and below, which led to a collision between the two planes. The impact caused an explosion that was devastating to both air machines. The collision was witnessed by the crew of Egyptian Airlines flight 797 from Cairo to Vienna, whose pilot informed the control center in Athens that during the flight at an altitude of about 10,000 meters above sea level, he saw a flash about 600 meters below his plane. The rescue missions of both countries immediately went to the scene of the plane crash, hoping that both pilots managed to eject. Greek Super Puma and Turkish Cougar search and rescue helicopters participated in the rescue mission. However, only one of the two pilots was able to eject successfully - Turkish Air Force Lieutenant Halil Ibrahim Ozdemir. He was lucky the second time when he was accidentally spotted by sailors in the merchant navy. At a distance of about 100 miles from the Turkish coast, it was picked up by the Panamanian merchant ship Gas Century of the Japanese company Yamamaru. Greek Air Force pilot Konstantinos Iliakis did not manage to save himself - as a result of the impact, the cockpit of his F-16 was destroyed, so he could not eject normally. The search for the Greek pilot turned out to be fruitless. The sailors of the frigate Λήμνος managed to find only the Greek pilot's helmet and a survival kit with Greek markings. According to Greek media reports, Konstantinos Iliakis was one of the most experienced F-16 pilots who was trained in the US and had many flight hours. The incident caused a major crisis and led to heightened tensions between official Athens and Ankara, with the Greek and Turkish sides traditionally blaming each other for the disaster. In the end, Greece and Turkey toned down accusatory rhetoric and defused the conflict, but failed to settle it. Despite the fact that both countries are part of the North Atlantic Alliance, their disputes in the Mediterranean continue. To date, the Turkish-Greek conflict is the only one in which F-16s have suffered officially confirmed air combat losses. In addition to the May 23, 2006 crash, there were other incidents over the Aegean Sea that resulted in the downing of these fighters.

Title: The situation at the front and the needs of the Armed Forces: the President met with the US Secretar...
Description: This is stated in messages of the head of state. The head of state emphasized the importance of this signal - the steady and strong support of Ukraine from leading partners, and also noted the personal participation of high-ranking officials of the USA and Great Britain in the fourth summit of the international Crimean Platform. -First of all, I would like to say a big thank you for the great support of our country to President Joseph Biden and Congress - for bipartisan support. We are also very grateful to the United Kingdom for your support and leadership on many security issues. Both of your countries have been leaders in supporting Ukraine since the beginning of the full-scale war,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy said. The President informed about the situation on the front line and the priority needs of the Defense Forces. Separately, he emphasized that it is important for Ukraine to obtain permission to use long-range weapons provided by the United States and other partners as soon as possible. Also during the meeting, they discussed the prospects of cooperation in the field of defense industry within the framework of the signed bilateral security agreements. The head of state noted that the emphasis should be on joint production on the territory of Ukraine. In addition, he thanked Anthony Blinken for another sanctions package against Iran adopted the day before in connection with the supply of ballistic missiles to Russia. The President also noted effective defense cooperation with Great Britain, which enables our soldiers to defend Ukraine on land and at sea. The head of state expressed gratitude for the obiczyaye-bilshe-zbroyi/-> new defense package announced during last week's Rammstein-style meeting. Volodymyr Zelenskyi and David Lammy discussed the implementation of the security agreement and agreed on further steps to conclude a new bilateral agreement on the transition to a stronger and deeper partnership. The President emphasized the importance of increasing the sanctions pressure of Great Britain on the Russian Federation and its satellites. In particular, he thanked for the introduction of new sanctions against Iran and the Russian shadow fleet and aerospace forces. The head of state also noted the participation of the USA and Great Britain in the first Peace Summit. During the meeting, special attention was paid to the preparation for the second Summit, which is a very important platform for the restoration of a just peace for Ukraine. The parties discussed future contacts between the leaders of the states within the framework of the session of the UN General Assembly in New York this month, and also coordinated approaches to holding joint events on the sidelines of the session of the General Assembly. As reported by ArmyInform, Anthony Blinken in Kyiv announced on the allocation of more than 700 million dollars of new aid to continue supporting Ukraine in the fight against Russian aggression.

Title: How foreigners fight - told the GUR
Description: He reported this on the air of Channel 24. The GUR noted that volunteers from different countries of the world, who came to Ukraine at the call of President Volodymyr Zelensky, formed the International Legion of the GUR MOU at the beginning of a full-scale invasion. They took part in all key campaigns at the front: Kyiv region, Kharkiv region, Kherson region, Zaporizhzhia, Donetsk and Luhansk regions. -If we talk about foreigners, these are people who usually have a lot of military service experience in their countries and combat experience in other wars. We have servicemen for whom this is already the fifth or sixth war,- Volodymyr said. According to him, all foreigners without exception, even American Rangers or Navy SEALs, must go through a stage of training, standardization and other processes that help adapt to our realities. -When our candidates write to us with a desire to join the unit, we always tell them: 'Guys, no matter how experienced you are, no one is ready for such a war as here,'- explained the representative of the International Legion of the GUR. The HUR noted that the working language in the Legion is English, but servicemen from other countries also learn Ukrainian. -Many foreigners attend Ukrainian courses and learn our language quite effectively. They are already ordering coffee and hotdogs at gas stations. It's very cool,- said Volodymyr. As reported by ArmyInform, the International Legion of the GUR to the Day of Military Intelligence svoyih-operaczij/->listed his operations.

Title: The USA provides Ukraine with a new $700 million aid package
Description: This is stated in statement of the US State Department. This aid will be aimed at supporting Ukraine's energy infrastructure, providing necessary humanitarian aid to internally displaced persons and refugees, as well as supporting demining operations. $325 million will go to energy aid to support Ukraine's efforts to restore its energy infrastructure in the face of ongoing Russian attacks. This aid comes in addition to the $500 million announced by US Vice President Kamala Harris at the Peace Summit and more than $1 billion announced by international partners since June 2024. -This assistance will help repair and restore Ukrainian energy facilities damaged by Russia's brutal attacks, implement new distributed energy technologies, provide emergency backup power for critical services such as water and heat, and strengthen the physical security of critical energy infrastructure,- the statement said. Nearly $290 million in new humanitarian aid will go towards humanitarian support, including safe drinking water, food, affordable housing, legal aid, health, livelihoods, protection services and education, supported by international and local partners. The additional funding will allow humanitarian organizations to provide assistance such as generators, fuel and warm kits to help people stay warm during the winter. More than 102 million dollars will be allocated for humanitarian aid for demining. Funds will also be used for training and equipment for Ukrainian sappers, as well as support for demining groups to return land to productive use. As reported by ArmyInform, Great Britain announced the allocation of at least 242 million pounds to support Ukraine against the background of continuous Russian attacks, as well as the deployment of $484 million in fiscal support and the supply of military equipment.

Title: OUV -Tavria-: the Russians changed the directions of assaults in the Orichiv and Dnieper directions
Description: About this on the air Army TV, the spokesman of the OUV said - Tavria- captain Dmytro Lykhovii. -The Russians are putting the most pressure on the Dnieper region, where increased activity has been observed for several days in a row compared to recent weeks,- Dmytro Lykhova said. According to him, during the last five days there were 46 attempts of assaults and four more attempts today. The geographical nature of this pressure has changed somewhat. -If earlier they stormed the left bank of the Dnieper in the area of ​​the village of Krynki, a little further north, where our units retreated after they left this completely destroyed settlement, then in the last few days the assaults have been on various islands along a large stretch of the left bank.- he said. The occupiers operate east of Krynok and closer to Kherson itself, where there is a large and fairly wide gray area. -Probably, they gathered courage and started to try to capture this gray area. But they do not succeed, assault actions are not successful,- the spokesman added. In the Orihiv direction, the enemy has also changed the point of effort and is trying to press not only on the Robotynsky ledge in the area of ​​Robotyny and Malaya Tokmachka, but also further west closer to Zaporizhzhia in the area of ​​the village of Mali Shcherbaki. -This is also a de-occupied territory that was liberated as a result of the 2023 counteroffensive, and now the Russians have renewed pressure there. -Several assaults take place every day, in particular with the support of aviation,- Dmytro Lykhova added. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kurakhiv direction, the Russian troops are storming in small groups and have almost not used armored vehicles in recent days. pro-demonstraczijni-ataky-rosiyan-na-kurahivskomu-napryamku/->conducting demonstration attacks.

Title: The number of shot down has exceeded a hundred: reconnaissance drones shoot down the enemy in Kharki...
Description: This was reported by the spokesman of Kharkiv OTU on the air of the nationwide telethon -Edyny Novyny- - Colonel Vitaly Sarantsev. He said that the Russians have quite a wide range of reconnaissance drones, but the Defense Forces shoot them down already on a regular basis. - They are looking for routes for the movement of personnel and equipment in order to launch fire and missile strikes in the future. At the same time, we are learning little by little. The count is already in the tens or, probably, already over a hundred destroyed enemy UAVs, the spokesman said. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how drones of the 109th mountain assault battalion 10 of the Edelweiss Mountain Assault Brigade destroyed an enemy reconnaissance unmanned aerial vehicle of the Merlin-VR type with the help of an FPV drone.

Title: - Liberation Day - Belgorod was not celebrated - local people were outraged: interception of GUR
Description: This is what is said in the intercepted by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, in the conversation of a resident of Krasnaya Yaruga, Belgorod Region. What annoys the residents of Belgorod region the most is that at a time when Belgorod residents are afraid to stick their noses in the street, Kharkiv celebrated the Independence Day of Ukraine. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how -sholomosyajnyj Achilles- defeated -Grad- in Belgorod Oblast .

Title: Rustem Umyerov: Our goal is to return every piece of Ukrainian land, including Crimea
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine reported this. -For me, this is not just a business meeting or an opportunity to communicate with international partners. This is my personal struggle. Crimea is my home, and every day I, like millions of Ukrainians, feel the pain of the Russian occupation for my state and for our people on the peninsula,- said Rustem Umyerov. He emphasized that Russia uses our land for missile attacks, turning the peninsula into a springboard for aggression against Ukraine. -Therefore, Crimea is a key battlefield for our freedom. And we will not stop until we bring him home,- the Minister of Defense emphasized. He reminded that over the past year, thanks to long-range weapons, Ukraine changed the balance of power in the Black Sea and created a -grain corridor- independent of Russia, through which more than 5,000 ships passed. Defense forces destroyed 24 Russian ships, regained control of Snake Island and deployed the world's first drone swarm technology to counter the Russian fleet. -Our next step is to ensure security in the entire Black Sea region. As part of strengthening our maritime capabilities at the last Ramstein, we signed the Maritime Capabilities Coalition with our partners. This will provide us with additional support in protecting our internal waters and Ukraine's interests in international maritime waters,- said Rustem Umyerov. He added that our goal remains the same — to return every piece of Ukrainian land, including Crimea. -We are getting closer to this goal, in particular, thanks to such meetings as the Crimean Platform. Glory to Ukraine!- said the Minister of Defense. As reported by ArmyInform, President Volodymyr Zelenskyi during a speech at the summit of the Crimean Platform -prezydent-na-samiti-krymskoyi-platformy/-> declared that Ukraine will return all temporarily occupied territories and all citizens of our state.

Title: In Volyn, a former official organized the escape of evaders for $5,000
Description: About this informs the Security Service of Ukraine. According to the case materials, the former deputy head of the Volyn Regional Military Administration was involved in the organization of the raid. During her tenure at the OVA, the suspect set up a mechanism for the escape of evaders in the guise of drivers transporting humanitarian goods. The cost of such a -service- was up to 5,000 US dollars per client. To implement the -scheme-, the organizer involved the director of a local charity fund, which arranged international flights for conscript drivers. In this way, the personal data of conscripts was entered into the -Shlyah- information system, which allowed them to go abroad as -volunteers-. In order to find potential customers and transfer money, the person involved involved seven more accomplices. The SBU employees documented the criminal actions of the participants of the event and detained the organizer. During the searches, mobile phones and laptops with evidence of illegal activity were seized from the premises of the accused. Currently, the ex-conspirator and her accomplices have been notified of suspicion under the following articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: The ex-conspirator is currently in custody. The perpetrator and her accomplices face up to 12 years in prison with confiscation of property. Comprehensive measures were conducted under the procedural guidance of the Prosecutor General's Office. As reported by ArmyInform, Kharkiv lawyer set up a scheme for illegal departure of conscripted men abroad.

Title: Kherson anti-aircraft guns shot down three -martyrs-
Description: This was reported on September 11 by the Air Force of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Russian -martyrs- were hit by missiles. Already in the morning, the crash sites of the remains of Russian attack UAVs were found. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of September 11, 2024, the radio engineering troops of the Air Force were detected and escorted 34 enemy air attack vehicles.

Title: The Defense Forces spoke about demonstration attacks by Russians in the Kurakhiv direction
Description: About this on the air Army TV the representative of the press service of the 79th separate amphibious assault brigade Orest Drymalovskyi. -The enemy conducts assaults every day. Currently, it is precisely on our part of the front in the Marin community that the enemy has been conducting infantry assaults for the past few days, the equipment is being used in a limited mode,- said Orest Drymalovskyi. He also said that the enemy is in a certain sense carrying out demonstration actions, tanks, BMPs and infantry are leaving. -But as soon as they enter the line of attack, our artillery starts working, they immediately turn around. Obviously, the enemy wants to identify our firing positions,- – explained the speaker. According to him, the enemy is also carrying out assaults in the direction of the village of Kostyantynivka, mostly infantry. -Our paratroopers repulse them, our drones practice with -maviks- with drops.- Today, six occupiers were killed, 11 were wounded,- he said. As reported by ArmyInform, since the beginning of the day, invaders our units were attacked 14 times. They tried to advance near Kostyantynivka, Ukranian and Georgiivka. Eight fights are still ongoing.

Title: Without training and motivation: in the Kharkiv region, Russia is fighting with poorly trained soldi...
Description: Colonel Vitaly Sarantsev, the spokesman of Kharkiv OTU, announced this on the air of the nationwide telethon -Yedini Novyni- . — This is a newly arrived personnel recruited by Russia — an existing mobilization resource has been raised. It is not yet known for sure who it is. These may be some ex-prisoners or representatives of foreign countries. In particular, there used to be people from Central Asia, Africa or the Middle East, he said. The spokesman noted that the Russian soldiers transferred to the Kharkiv direction have a low level of training and refuse to perform the assigned tasks. -Over the past few days or even weeks, we have already repeatedly noted cases of refusal of personnel - both in the direction of deep Lypka and in the Vovchansky direction - from carrying out combat and special tasks,- Vitaly Sarantsev recalled. The military officer said that cases of refusals have already been recorded and are becoming more and more frequent even in those brigades of the Russian army that arrived relatively recently in the Kharkiv direction. — A few weeks ago, the rotation of the 136th motorized rifle brigade, which took up positions near Vovchansk in the area of ​​the Tykh point itself, ended. They replaced the 82nd Airborne Assault Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, which suffered heavy losses and was withdrawn to recovery. This 136th brigade came in and stood still for several weeks. They tried to carry out intelligence activities, and equipped sabotage-reconnaissance groups, and tried to storm our positions head-on. Now they have also suffered losses, and as of yesterday - the day before yesterday, we have information that the servicemen of this brigade, which arrived in our direction not so long ago, are also refusing to perform combat and special tasks, he said. The spokesman explained that the special tasks include the establishment and provision of logistics and fortification equipment for positions. — This indicates that the enemy is more and more often in practically all directions using personnel who are not morally ready to perform any tasks. That is, they raise the mobilization resource, prepare it very hastily. Whether by deception, coercion, or in some other way, using promises of monetary rewards to be sent to war. But people understand that they were simply deceived and simply refuse to go into battle any further, said Vitaly Sarantsev. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the north of Kharkiv region, the occupiers throw soldiers into battle less than a month after signing the contract and without any preparation, as a result enemy stormtroopers are sabotaging the orders of the command and in whole groups refuse to carry out the assigned tasks.

Title: Sudden -love- on the border can end in 5 years in prison
Description: About this informs September 11 State Border Service of Ukraine. The couple is said to have tied the knot at the end of August. The man never managed to cross the border. -On the detection of signs of a criminal offense, responsibility for which is provided for in Art. 332 of the Criminal Code -Illegal transportation of persons across the state border of Ukraine-, the border guards sent a report to the National Police,- the report says. Currently, the investigators of the National Police have already informed the citizen about the suspicion of committing a criminal offense provided for in Part 1 of Article 332 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine. The sanction of the article provides for punishment - deprivation of liberty for a period of three to five years. The pre-trial investigation is ongoing. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces or recruiting centers.

Title: The occupiers hit with Tornado-S on Constantinople in Donetsk region, there are dead and wounded
Description: reported this by the head of the Donetsk Regional State Administration, Vadym Filashkin. This afternoon, the Russians shelled the village with Tornado-S surface-to-air missiles. As a result of the shelling, 6 private houses, a cafe, a shop, an administrative building, a power line and 12 cars were damaged. -All of Donetsk is dangerous for life. I emphasize once again: evacuate in a timely manner,- urged Vadym Filashkin. As reported by ArmyInform, the number of victims after the Russian strike in the Kamian district of the Dnipropetrovsk region grew to four.

Title: In the Dnipropetrovsk region, the number of victims as a result of the Russian attack has increased
Description: This was announced by the head of the Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration, Serhiy Lysak. Two more women, aged 37 and 58, sought medical help. Medics provide assistance to victims of enemy missile attack. Nikopolshchyna also suffered from the shelling of the Russians, there were no casualties, but there is destruction. Several occupations took place in the district center. Among the damaged were 5 local homes, 3 farm buildings, a gymnasium and power lines. A car was mutilated in the Marganets community. In Myrivska, the territory is still being examined. In general, during the day, the Russians hit them with heavy artillery and UAVs. As previously reported by ArmyInform, in the Kamian district An explosion rang out in Dnipropetrovsk region. As a result of the attack of the Russian troops, there is a dead person and injured.

Title: -Vasylok-, -beha- and two pickups: a full yagdtash of enemy equipment was shot by -Achilles-
Description: This was reported by the battalion commander, Captain Yury Fedorenko, to ArmiyaInform. -The enemy committed offensive actions with the aim of capturing the positions of adjacent units. UBpLA calculations effectively destroyed the enemy's assets, thus stopping the offensive on the position. The enemy's shelters, fortifications and personnel were also hit,- he said. In the hunting grounds, the battalion managed to shoot quite a lot of enemy game - plump pickup trucks, hippopotamus-like -loaves-, biting poisonous -Cornflower-. A video of a successful hunt in the Kharkiv direction in the area of ​​the villages of Liptsi and Hlyboke drones shared on their Telegram -channels. -They swarmed RSNV equipment in Kharkiv Oblast - the Achilles battalion is operating,- the drones said in a message and provided statistics of destroyed and damaged enemy equipment: Earlier ArmyInform showed how long-range -helmeted- Achilles hit exactly under the turret of a Russian tank and -Grad- won in Belgorod Oblast, and the all-seeing -Achilles- saw and eliminated the invaders in Kharkiv region with the help of the Stymphal birds.

Title: Britain has announced an aid package for Ukraine worth more than 600 million pounds and promises mor...
Description: This is stated in a message at sites of the British government on the occasion of the visit British Foreign Minister David Lammy and US Secretary of State Anthony Blinken to Ukraine. -This is the first ever joint visit of the British Foreign Minister and the US Secretary of State, which underlines the unwavering determination of Britain and the US to support Ukraine,- the statement reads. £242m will be made available over 2024-25 for urgent humanitarian, energy and stabilization needs, as well as support for reform, recovery and reconstruction. These funds will support the most vulnerable segments of the population in Ukraine, as well as support long-term economic, recovery and energy needs. By the end of the year, Britain also intends to provide credit guarantees in the amount of 484 million US dollars for lending to the World Bank in order to strengthen the economic stability of Ukraine. These funds will be used to support vital public services, including supporting schools and hospitals, paying public sector salaries and funding pensions. The loan guarantee provided by the World Bank is the second part of the $3 billion aid package that Britain committed to at the Ukraine Reconstruction Conference held in London last year. -Great Britain's support for Ukraine is unwavering. Our commitment of more than £600 million is the latest contribution to our long-term support for Ukraine. This will provide vital support to the Ukrainians against the background of continuous Russian attacks,- said David Lammy. The British Defense Minister also confirmed the commitment to increase and accelerate the provision of military aid to Ukraine, announced in April. In particular, missiles for air defense systems, equipment for F-16 fighters, AS90 self-propelled artillery installations and spare barrels for them, military boats and naval guns have already been delivered to Ukraine. In addition, today the Minister of Defense also announced that hundreds of additional anti-aircraft missiles, tens of thousands of additional artillery ammunition and more armored vehicles will be delivered to Ukraine by the end of the year. As reported by ArmyInform, Latvia prepared another package of military support, which will include armored personnel carriers . It also became known today that Lithuania will finance the long-range capabilities of the Forces defense of Ukraine, in particular Palyanitsa drone missiles.

Title: He ordered to capture -Kharkiv in 5 days-: -a hero of Russia- was informed about the suspicion
Description: The Security Service of Ukraine informed about this. The suspect is Lieutenant General Konstantin Stepanishchev, deputy commander of the 6th Combined Arms Army of the Western Military District of the Russian Federation. The military designed and tried to implement an operation to capture Kharkiv by the end of February 2022. According to Stepanishchev's plan, the units of the ground troops subordinate to him were to surround the city and take it -in a ring- in 5 days. For this, assault groups of Russian troops were to cover Russian fighters, and Iskander ballistic missiles were to attack the civilian infrastructure of the regional center. In addition, during the fighting, a special-purpose group of military intelligence of the Russian Federation (known as GRU) tried to infiltrate Kharkiv to capture the local administration building and raise the Russian flag there. In the event of the capture of the city, Stepanishchev planned to order subordinate units to take control of all administrative and strategic objects of the city and to initiate a full range of isolation and filtration measures against Kharkiv residents. In Office of the Prosecutor General and The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office also noted that during the invasion units under Stepanishchev gradually occupied settlements from the state border to the suburbs in order to have advantageous firing positions for shelling the regional center The law enforcement officers also established that in 2014 he took part in hostilities against Ukrainian troops in the Luhansk region. Then he commanded the 4th separate motorized rifle brigade of the armed forces of the Russian Federation. Later, he was promoted to the rank of general, given a new position, a -Hero of Russia- star, and also an order to prepare for a full-scale invasion of Ukraine. Earlier, ArmiyaInform reported that law enforcement officers completed the investigation into the Russian serviceman who tortured a resident of Kyiv Oblast.

Title: The government has taken a step towards granting the status of UBD in automatic mode
Description: This is stated in the message at site of the Government portal. The resolution -Some issues of automatically granting the status of combatant during martial law- (No. 1041) was developed by experts of the Ministry of Veterans Affairs of Ukraine to implement recent changes to the Law of Ukraine -On the Status of War Veterans, Guarantees of Their Social Protection.- The new Order defines the procedure, grounds and list of information that is necessary for automatically granting the status of a participant in hostilities during the period of martial law. According to the document, this status is considered granted after the corresponding record is published in the Unified State Register of War Veterans. At the same time, the information is entered into it by authorized persons of military units within five days from the day of the start of execution of the combat order (order). -This decision is a significant step towards the automatic granting of UBD status to our Defenders. The next step is the development of appropriate digital tools that create the conditions for the practical implementation of the new system. We will do everything to make it work as soon as possible. After all, a serviceman who fights on the front line or performs special tasks does not have to go through complex and lengthy bureaucratic procedures,- said Minister of Veterans Affairs of Ukraine Nataliya Kalmykova. To implement the resolution, the Ministry of Veterans Affairs will technically finalize the Unified State Register of War Veterans, as well as create technical opportunities to connect officials of the security and defense forces to it — to enter relevant records of their servicemen's participation in combat operations.

Title: We will leave nothing and no one in captivity - the President at the Summit of the Crimean Platform
Description: About this stated President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyi during the fourth summit of the international Crimean platform. -We will not leave anything or anyone in captivity. I would like all our citizens in Ukraine, in the temporarily occupied territories of Ukraine to hear this - no matter where you are and no matter how difficult it is for you. It is part of our morality. Ukraine does not trade its land and does not abandon its people,- said Volodymyr Zelenskyi. The President emphasized that Ukraine knows, remembers and fights for each of Russia's Crimean prisoners, for all civilians and military, adults and children who are in captivity or under temporary occupation. He called on the states of our region, particularly the Muslim societies of Turkey and Azerbaijan, to show leadership and help confront injustice and abuse. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also asked the countries that are working on the implementation of the Peace Formula to convince their partners who have so far refrained from joint work. -True peace should not have any alternatives. No frozen occupations! No people left in captivity! No repressions that are forgotten and because of that, as if forgiven by the world,- he emphasized.

Title: Croatia will provide Ukraine with a new package of military aid
Description: This is reported by 11 September Office of the President. Volodymyr Zelenskyi, at a meeting with the Prime Minister of Croatia Andrii Plenkovych, expressed gratitude to Croatia for the targeted assistance to restore the Ukrainian energy industry. The head of state noted Croatia's support in resisting Russian aggression and expressed gratitude for the 11th package of military aid announced during the visit. -We are very grateful for your support since the beginning of this invasion. We count on you, in particular, in political matters, on the way to the EU and NATO. We are grateful to your people for helping refugees,- the President said. The leaders discussed humanitarian demining of contaminated territories. Volodymyr Zelensky noted the leadership role of Croatia in this process and thanked for the initiative to hold donor conferences on demining. During the meeting, special attention was paid to post-war reconstruction and reconstruction of the energy infrastructure. The head of state thanked the head of the government of the Republic of Croatia for his personal participation in the fourth summit of the international Crimea platform and genoczydu-krymskotatarskogo-narodu/->opening of the Memorial to the Victims of the Genocide of the Crimean Tatar People. As reported by ArmyInform, the Republic of Lithuania will also provide 10 million euros to finance the long-range capabilities of the Defense Forces of Ukraine, in particular the Palanytsia drone missile.

Title: A tank, a mortar, an antenna and 2 warehouses — successful hits of our drones in the Kharkiv region
Description: The video of the strikes appeared on September 11 on the brigade's channel. Our strike drones attacked: personnel, a Russian tank, a mortar, an enemy antenna and twice hit the BC structure. -The enemy disguises his equipment and weapons in the green. But after deciphering the images from the sky, all this is discovered and destroyed by our pilots,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 3rd assault brigade detected and destroyed a squad of invaders right at their positions.

Title: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine invited Bulgaria to join the demining coalition
Description: About this notified in the MOU. Oleksandr Balanutsa congratulated his colleague on his new position and thanked him for his active pro-Ukrainian position. Nikolai Nenchev was the Minister of Defense of Bulgaria from 2014 to 2017, so he understands well and supports the initiatives of the Ukrainian Defense Department. The Ukrainian and Bulgarian sides discussed ways to continue cooperation and assistance, including the training of Ukrainian servicemen within EUMAM. -Thank you for your steadfast position and support for Ukraine in the fight against Russian terrorists. I hope that your work in the position of temporary chargé d'affaires of Bulgaria in Ukraine will benefit both countries,- said Deputy Minister Oleksandr Balanutsa. In addition, the parties discussed Bulgaria's participation in coalitions of capabilities — thanked for participation in the coalition of integrated anti-aircraft and anti-missile defense and joining the coalition for the development of maritime capabilities. The Ukrainian side also invited to join other coalitions, in particular the demining coalition. -Bulgaria supports Ukraine's path to the EU and NATO, this will significantly increase the level of defense capability in the region. Despite Russia's significant influence on Bulgaria, we remain on your side in this war,- assured Nikolay Nenchev, Bulgaria's Chargé d'affaires in Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, Deputy Ministers of Defense of Ukraine Stanislav Hayder and Oleksandr Balanutsa vijny/->held a meeting in Kyiv with a delegation of the American Institute for the Study of War (ISW) led by the president by Kimberly Kagan and Director of the American Enterprise Institute's Critical Threats Project, Frederick Kagan.

Title: - Clean-up of Russians and destruction of Russian drone operators: stream from a front-line city
Description: After a tank, FPV drones, and Baba Yaga worked around the house, an M2 Bradley with paratroopers drove up to it. Under the cover of the BMP, fighters of the 425th OSHB -Skala- entered the high-rise building and began clearing it of Russians. -Medoids- from the 92nd separate assault brigade named after the basket commander Ivan Sirk, with the support of BTR-4, cleared Russian positions in the village of Hlyboke, Kharkiv region. In the Pokrovsky direction, gunners of the 47th separate mechanized brigade destroyed Russian drone operators. Also, our fighters discovered a room with an ammunition warehouse and two Russian cars. The second shell also hit the target, the warehouse burned. These and other topics are discussed by the presenters - lieutenant colonel Serhii Misyura and junior sergeant Volodymyr Kravchuk.

Title: The 35th recruiting center of the Ukrainian army was opened in another city
Description: About this informs September 11 Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. -On the initiative of the Ministry of Defense and with the support of the military administrations of the district and region, we are opening these centers today. We are sure that this is the future of our Armed Forces, where motivated defenders serve,- said the head of Sumy OVA, Volodymyr Artyukh. In the Sumy region, this is already the third recruiting center of the Ukrainian army, which was opened in cooperation with the Ministry of Defense, military administrations and local self-government bodies. Previously, centers were opened in Shostka and Sumy. -Although the first center in the region was opened in May, and the second at the end of July, 339 people have already turned to them for consultation. Among the candidates who join the Defense Forces in the Sumy region, there are many women - 30%,- the message says. Summons will not be issued at the recruiting center. You can also contact recruiters and get on the path to joining the army with a subpoena to clarify data. -Actually, this whole story is about everyone choosing their place in the defense of the state. This is a unique opportunity that takes into account world experience. I call on the residents of the community: contact the center, visit the civilian premises, where summonses are not distributed,- said Oleksiy Bezhevets, the authorized representative of the Ministry of Education and Culture on recruiting issues. According to him, there you will receive professional advice regarding your potential contribution to the defense of the country. So you can get advice and be recruited in Okhtyrka at the following address: st. Nezalezhnosti 5 (premises of the city TsNAP). Also, civilian recruiters who have undergone special training will provide answers to all questions by phone: +38 (066) 372 2793, +38 (068) 694 2063. You can find more up-to-date information about the recruiting centers of the Ukrainian army at sites. As reported by ArmyInform, in Uman opened the first recruiting center of the Ukrainian army in Cherkasy region.

Title: Officials of the Ministry of Defense held a meeting with the delegation of the Institute for the Stu...
Description: About this reported in the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The American Institute for the Study of War is one of the well-known think tanks whose work helps the world see the real state of affairs during the Russian aggression against Ukraine. Thanks to the independent analytical reports of this think tank, Ukraine deepens cooperation with partners and receives more aid, the deputy minister said. The institute often refutes the disinformation of the Kremlin, which Russia tries to impose on the world. -The Institute for the Study of War has become an important think tank since the beginning of the full-scale invasion. His reports are cited by international media, which helps Ukraine to effectively fight against Russian propaganda,- noted Oleksandr Balanutsa, Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for European Integration. He thanked the Institute for the Study of War for its work, which helps the world see the real state of affairs during the Russian aggression against Ukraine. The Ukrainian delegation familiarized the American colleagues with the achievements of institutional reform in the Ministry of Defense, and also informed them about the current security situation in Ukraine and around its borders. Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Stanislav Hayder emphasized the importance of dialogue between the Ministry of Defense and analytical centers. The official noted that joint work helps to find new solutions, implement innovations and improve strategic approaches. -I am sincerely grateful for fruitful cooperation. I am convinced that dialogue between the Ministry of Defense and think tanks is not only important, but also necessary for the further development of our defense capabilities,- he said. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the Ministry of Defense Ukraine has developed and plans to submit to the Verkhovna Rada a draft law on the register of military personnel.

Title: They fire 70-100 shells every day - how our artillery works on the field
Description: A video of artillery operation was published on September 11 on the page of the Airborne Assault Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine . -Finally, we moved the hostilities to the territory of the aggressor's enemy, Russia. This is a very big achievement, which we could not have even thought about 2 years ago,- Roman, the commander of the fire unit, shares his impressions of working in enemy territory. Artillerymen of the 95th brigade are conducting intensive combat operations in one of the districts of the Kursk region. Enemy forces fully experience the accuracy and power of the British L119 light howitzer. And these are weapons and military equipment, the manpower of the enemy. The calculation works on the enemy almost around the clock. -We use BC from 70 to 100 per day. Efficiency in the chicken coop is 90%. We destroy infantry, military equipment. The cannon hits very well,- says Dmytro, commander of the artillery unit. ArmyInform told the story of the pilot -Bully- who, in order to join the army, took permission from his parents, and then destroyed 5 Russians with one drone.

Title: When Ukraine will launch a register of servicemen: fresh details from the Ministry of Defense
Description: According to the correspondent of ArmiyaInform, this was reported by the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for digital development, digital transformations and digitalization Kateryna Chernogorenko during the presentation of the innovative DOT-Chain system on September 11. -I just returned from the Verkhovna Rada committee, where we discussed the registration of the draft law on the register of military personnel. We will have a modern, decentralized registry of servicemen with the most advanced architecture. Finally, we will be able to manage our human capital, make informed decisions. We will be able to understand how to move the idea of ​​the Commander-in-Chief, the General Staff; to plan mobilization. Because without understanding the current situation regarding the number of military personnel, we will not be able to plan mobilization, rear support, etc.,- said Kateryna Chernogorenko. Answering a clarifying question from an ArmiyaInform correspondent, the deputy head of the Ministry of Defense said that the team of the Ministry of Defense developed and initiated a draft law on the register of military personnel. The Defense Department was supported by the National Security Committee. -In fact, this is our joint work, joint work with people's deputies, joint work with other Defense Security Forces, for example, with the Security Service of Ukraine, with the State Border Service. We are immediately introducing such a register at the level of broad consultations, which will include the possibility of recording, registering and accounting for all servicemen, all Defense Forces,- said Kateryna Chernogorenko. Currently, the process is at the stage of registration of the draft law. -Next is the generally established procedure of passing two readings in the Verkhovna Rada. And I hope that we will adopt this bill quickly enough and have a full-fledged register, a modern register, properly protected, with the ability to record and plan our military operations,- said the deputy minister. According to her, such a register will allow the top military leadership of the country to effectively manage human resources, understand the mobilization potential, plan rear support and timely purchase everything necessary for the army. According to Kateryna Chernogorenko's predictions, the adoption of the draft law by the parliament is expected by the end of 2024. As reported by ArmyInform, Japan will support Ukraine in the implementation of military IT projects.

Title: Ukrainians will be protected by Latvian -armor-
Description: It became it is known after the meeting held by Prime Minister of Ukraine Denys Shmyhal and Prime Minister of Latvia Evika Silinia in Kyiv on September 11. The parties discussed the expansion of cooperation between the two states in all areas related to the strengthening of the Ukrainian military on the battlefield. In particular, it was about cooperation between defense companies. -I thank the Latvian government and people for concrete and consistent steps to strengthen Ukraine's position in the fight against the aggressor. In particular, for the initiative -UAV Coalition for Ukraine- and the supply of drones for Ukrainian soldiers,- said Denys Shmyhal. During the meeting, Evika Silinia announced another package of military support, which will include armored personnel carriers. Denys Shmyhal emphasized that Latvia consistently supports sanctions against the aggressor and is our reliable ally in EU and NATO integration. Separately, the Prime Minister of Ukraine emphasized that Latvia helps our country not only in the defense, but also in the social and energy spheres: they provide assistance with energy equipment and plan to transfer solar panels for hospitals to Ukraine. He also thanked the Prime Minister of Latvia for his interest and support in the reconstruction projects of our country, in particular the Chernihiv region. As reported by ArmyInform earlier, the IOU and NATO delegations discussed speeding up the promised aid to Ukraine from the allies.

Title: The most active enemy near Novotroitskyi and Mykhailivka: the number of combat encounters increased ...
Description: This is reported in the operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 16 :00 September 11. The invaders continue to use aviation and artillery in the border areas of Sumy and Chernihiv regions. In the Kharkiv direction, the Russians twice stormed the positions of our units in the Gatyshch and Tikhoi districts, at the moment the fighting is still going on. On the Kupyansk direction the enemy attacked our positions six times. Ukrainian defenders repelled attacks near Lozova and Hlushkivka, and the battle continues near Sinkivka. In the Lyman direction the enemy attacked in the areas of Makiivka, Nevsky, Terniv, Grekivka, Druzhelyubivka, and Tverdokhlibovo. Since the beginning of the day, there have been nine clashes in this direction, three of which are still ongoing. The situation is under control. In the Toretsk direction The defense forces repelled three enemy attacks. The enemy stormed the areas of Toretsk and Nelipivka settlements. In the Pokrovsky direction the largest number of clashes. Since the beginning of the day, the occupiers have already made 16 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their occupied positions in the areas of Vozdvizhenka, Zeleny Pol, Novooleksandrivka, Grodivka, Novotroitskoho, Novogrodivka, Selidovoy and Mykhailivka. The defense forces are holding back the onslaught and have repulsed 13 enemy attacks, with three battles still ongoing. The most active enemy near Novotroitskyi and Mykhailivka.
